      • getInstance

        public static FirebaseWriter getInstance()
        Gets an instance of FirebaseWriter
        Returns:
        an instance of FirebaseWriter

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String ID)
        Adds a new document to the Players collection in Firebase with a given ID. If the ID is already taken, then nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        ID - the ID of the new document

      • addQRCode

        public void addQRCode​(QRCode code,
                      java.lang.String imagePath)
        Adds a qr code to Firebase and sets its qid field to the ID of the new document. If the code's qid field already has a value, then nothing happens. Also appends a reference to an image if the image path is provided.
        Parameters:
        code -

      • addImage

        public java.lang.String addImage​(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
        Compresses and uploads a new image to firebase. Returns the path to the image as a string.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to be uploaded
        Returns:

      • addComment

        public void addComment​(Comment comment,
                       java.lang.String qid)
        Adds a comment to Firebase and sets its cid field to the ID of the new document. If the comment's cid field already has a value, then nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        comment - The comment to be added
        qid - The Firebase document ID of the QR code the comment is posted under

      • deleteComment

        public void deleteComment​(Comment comment,
                          java.lang.String qid)
        Removes a comment from Firebase
        Parameters:
        comment - The comment to be deleted
        qid - The Firebase document ID of the QR code the comment is posted under

      • updateUsername

        public void updateUsername​(Player player,
                           java.lang.String newUsername,
                           FirebaseWriter.OnWrittenListener listener)
        Changes a players username in Firebase to a given value, provided that the new username isn't already taken
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose username will be updated
        newUsername - The new username
        listener - A listener that is called when the username is changed (or fails to change)
